nodes.text: The Javarica system was a star system that was located in the Tynquay sector of the Outer Rim Territories and the Trans-Hydian regions. The system was the origin point of the Javarican espresso.
The Javarica system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square Q-4.
